subject: SWK
title: Clinical Practice in Mental Health and Addictions
description: This course aims to equip students to provide sensitive and effective help to clients by presenting material concerning a range of mental health problems, assessment and treatment. The course considers clinical social work approaches across the continuum of mental health and addiction. Attention is focused on how social workers assess, document, support and intervene with consideration of the client, their family and social environment. (Note: This is an online course).
